traits.description: DO NOT DELETE THIS FIELD. This field will be overwritten in login.go's and registration.go's decoder() method. Do not add anything to this field as it has no effect.

upstream_parameters.$comment: Only the defined parameters are allowed. This is to prevent users from sending arbitrary parameters or craft URLs that cause unexpected behavior.

login_hint.description: The login hint could be an email address or identifier in the upstream provider to pre-fill the upstream provider login form

hd.description: The hd (hosted domain) parameter streamlines the login process for G Suite hosted accounts. By including the domain of the G Suite user (for example, mycollege.edu), you can indicate that the account selection UI should be optimized for accounts at that domain.
